about_the_game:
About this game.
This game is a horror action game from the body camera perspective.

Description.
The player has 7 bullets and there are several monsters in the area.
Bullets are limited, so use them only when necessary and avoid monsters if possible. Monsters also have headshot judges, so it is possible to take them down with a single blow.
If you are attacked by a monster, the game is over.
It is also possible to defeat a monster without being detected.
To complete the game, all three tools must be found and brought to the goal. The area must be carefully explored to find the tools.
The play time is about 15-30 minutes.

Features.
Realistic body camera viewpoint.

Game commentary is greatly welcomed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080ti
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: In this game, players have seven bullets to defeat monsters. Use bullets wisely and aim for head shots. It is also possible to avoid being found by the monsters. The game ends when the player is attacked. To clear the game, the player must find three tools and reach the goal.
